mapper.select: select seq,writer,title,content,writeDate,viewCount,(select count(*) from bambooComments where bamSeq=bamboo.seq) as commentCount from bamboo order by seq desc
select max(seq) from bamboo where writer=#{value}
mapper.update: update bamboo set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
update bamboo set viewCount=viewCount+1 where seq=#{value}
mapper.select: select * from (select bamboo.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from bamboo) where rown between #{start} and #{end}
